Module Projects
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Projects/Public/Interfaces/IPluginManager.h
Include #include "Interfaces/IPluginManager.h"

Syntax

class IPluginManager

Remarks

PluginManager manages available code and content extensions (both loaded and not loaded).

Classes

  Type Name Description
FLoadingModulesForPhaseEvent Callback for when modules for when LoadModulesForEnabledPlugins() completes loading for a specific phase.  
FNewPluginMountedEvent Event signature for being notified that a new plugin has been mounted  

Typedefs

Name Description
FGetExplanationForUnavailablePackageWithPluginInfoDelegate Delegate type for allowing higher levels systems to provide additional context for why a package was skipped during loading
FRegisterMountPointDelegate Delegate type for mounting content paths. Used internally by FPackageName code.

description: PluginManager manages available code and content extensions (both loaded and not loaded).
title: IPluginManager
